form.SN:
v ameriški angleščini pišemo
channeling
in
channeled
.

sense.def:
A channel
je valovna dolžina, na kateri oddajajo televizijske sporede.

seg.quote: He switched to the other channel.

sense.def:
Če je bilo nekaj storjeno
through particular channels
, se je zgodilo s posredovanjem neke skupine ljudi.

seg.quote: I notified the authorities through the normal channels.

sense.def:
To channel money into something
pomeni urediti tako, da je denar porabljen v določen namen.

seg.quote: ...the need to channel North Sea oil revenues into industry.

sense.def:
A channel
je tudi struga za vodni tok ali za vožnjo s čolni.

seg.quote: The main channels had been closed by enemy submarines.

sense.def:
The Channel
ali
the English Channel
je ozek morski preliv med Anglijo in Francijo.
